name: Rui Figueiredo
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Hello there, my name is Rui Figueiredo and I'm a front-end developer.

## Who is this guy?
Iâ€™m a geek, a gamer and a web afficionado. I like clean, minimalist designs and I love to turn them into fully functional websites using the latest technologies.

## What does he do?
Based in Portugal and working as consultant, I help clients across the globe to push their websites to the limit.
In a nutshell, I turn designs into fully working websites using either Drupal or Wordpress as a back-end platform. This means I get to try out all sorts of neat CSS, HTML and jQuery tricks to get the job done.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
